name: Garlic And Herb Hummus Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: garbanzo beans, garlic, tahini, lemon, olive oil, salt, pine nuts, fresh parsley, water, pita chip
recipeInstructionSteps: Boil the garbanzo beans until the skins come off. Remove the skins, drain.
Combine all ingredients in a food processor.
Blend until smooth adding small amounts of oil and water until desired consistency is achieved.
Add more lemon or tahini if needed.
Garnish with pine nuts and more oil!
Eat with fresh vegetables or pita chips.
